segments.text: What ’ s wrong with you , Ted ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ m speaking French . Don ’ t you know anything ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What ’ s wrong with speaking English ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I just got back from my language school . We have to speak French all day there . No English allowed !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What are you doing that for ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ m trying to learn new skills . It makes me more qualified for a good job .
segments.speaker: S1
